mapper.sql: a.ID_MENU AS menuId , a.ID_MENU_PARENT AS parentId , a.NAME AS name , a.URL AS url , a.PERMS AS perms , a.TYPE AS type , a.ICON AS icon , a.ORDER_NUM AS orderNum , a.STATUS AS status , a.CREATE_USER AS createUser , a.UPDATE_ID_USER AS updateUser , a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime , a.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , a.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
mapper.select:
select
from KDI_SYS_MENU a
a.DEL_FLAG = 0
AND a.ID_MENU_PARENT = #{parentId}
AND a.NAME LIKE '%#{name}%'

select
from KDI_SYS_MENU a JOIN KDI_SYS_ROLE_MENU rm on rm.ID_MENU = a.ID_MENU JOIN KDI_SYS_USER_ROLE ur on ur.ID_ROLE = rm.ID_ROLE where ur.ID_USER = #{userId} and a.DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.update: update KDI_SYS_MENU a set a.DEL_FLAG = 1 where a.ID_MENU = #{id}
